existing_features.title: Update the Rooms page search so that filtering is performed only by the roomâ€™s unique ID (room.id) rather than by room name; searching must match an ID exactly (after trimming whitespace), and an empty query must show the full rooms list.
Update user-facing copy in the Rooms search dialog to clearly indicate the search input expects a room ID (unique ID), including dialog description and input placeholder text.

Update the Rooms empty-state messaging so that when a non-empty room ID search returns no results, the helper text indicates no room was found for that ID (instead of suggesting trying a different search term generically).

new_feature_requests.summary: Restrict search functionality to only allow searching by unique ID

projectName: Restrict Rooms search to unique room ID only
